abstract.t: This document describes certain functionality that is missing in thecurrent 'Integration of Resource Management and SIP' [1] (a.k.a.manyfolks draft). An extension to add this functionality isoutlined.This functionality is needed in general to provide richer signallingcapabilities and can be employed in several scenarios. This draftdescribes its use in third party call control applications. If this extension is accepted it is foreseen that this draft would be merged with [1].
